kw.name: register
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'http://211.87.224.235:8800/registerpage.php'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '20021209' into text field 'name = user_id'.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'nickname' into text field 'name = nick'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking button 'name = submit'.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: return !!window.alert Without any arguments.
${alert} = True

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 用户20021209登录成功

kw.name: Return From Keyword
kw.doc: Returns from the enclosing user keyword.
kw.msg: Returning from the enclosing user keyword.
${alert} = True

kw.name: Convert To Boolean
kw.doc: Converts the given item to Boolean true or false.
kw.msg: ${res} = True

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
